file_insights.changes: Added LocalizationProvider with DateTimePicker component for due date selection
key_modifications: Wrapped DateTimePicker with LocalizationProvider and Controller
Configured DateTimePicker with proper MUI TextField slots for error handling
file_insights.impact: Enables date/time selection in RFI form with proper localization and form integration

patterns_discovered.description: Demonstrates integration of MUI's DateTimePicker with react-hook-form's Controller pattern
patterns_discovered.implementation_details: LocalizationProvider wraps Controller which manages DateTimePicker state, with slotProps configuring the underlying TextField for error display

patterns_discovered.description: Uses AdapterDayjs to provide date handling capabilities to LocalizationProvider
patterns_discovered.benefit: Enables localization support and consistent date handling across the form

patterns_discovered.description: Uses fieldState.error to conditionally display error messages and set error state on underlying TextField
patterns_discovered.consistency: Matches existing form error handling patterns in the component

gotchas_discovered.detail: The LocalizationProvider is a required wrapper that provides the date adapter context to DateTimePicker
gotchas_discovered.impact: Missing this wrapper will cause DateTimePicker to fail or display incorrectly

gotchas_discovered.detail: Controller must be used with proper spread of field props and custom slotProps configuration for TextField customization
gotchas_discovered.impact: Direct use without Controller or improper prop passing will break form state management and error display

gotchas_discovered.detail: DateTimePicker disabled prop should be coordinated with loading and isSubmitting states
gotchas_discovered.impact: Ensures consistent UX when form is processing, preventing conflicting user interactions

approach_outcome.strategy: Direct implementation of DateTimePicker with LocalizationProvider wrapper and react-hook-form Controller integration
approach_outcome.implementation_quality: Production-ready - follows MUI best practices and integrates seamlessly with existing form patterns

recommendations.recommendation: Verify that the dueDate field is properly defined in the Zod schema used by the form
recommendations.rationale: The component assumes dueDate exists in the form schema but the schema definition is not visible in the diff

recommendations.recommendation: Add tests for DateTimePicker interaction including date selection and error display
recommendations.rationale: Date picker components are interactive and require testing for user interactions

recommendations.recommendation: Consider making the date format and locale configurable based on user preferences
recommendations.rationale: Current implementation uses default Dayjs adapter; could enhance with regional customization

recommendations.recommendation: Document the dependency on @mui/x-date-pickers package and its peer dependencies
recommendations.rationale: DatePicker libraries often have specific peer dependency requirements
